story_21_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
There is no such thing as the strongest Pokémon.
Nor is there a perfect team combination.
story_21_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I knew this, yet I thought that we could never lose.
It seems that our path was steeper than we
had thought.
story_21_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But it wouldn’t be worth it if it were easy,
would it? The challenge is what drives us
to master the path.
story_21_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Besides, we’re martial artists.
You know it’s not in our nature to quit.
story_21_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I feel like I saw your true nature during our battle.
story_21_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You have a heart that cares for your friends
and Pokémon.
story_21_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Strengthen that heart of yours, and use it to rise
to the top in this tournament! Best of luck!
